title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Charlotte & Charlotte Motor Speedway
description:
In this video we look at two new mods available for MSFS 2020. The first one is the Charlotte Motor Speedway and the second one is Charlotte City. Both have been created by the same developer and are a very high quality without impacting the FPS to much.

If you would like to give the addons a try yourself visit the site below to download them:

Charlotte Motor Speedway:
https://flightsim.to/file/14933/charlotte-motor-speedway

Charlotte City:
https://flightsim.to/file/14932/charlotte-city
